name: Follow My Footsteps
description:
After you lost your daughter you can no longer live in the same place, so you decided to move to a new house in the woods. After your arrival you started unpacking and noticed the old doll in the garage. So when you unpack everything you decide to trow the doll away. You think you will live happily ever after? Think again...

This is horror VR game with puzzle elements and deep story line that you have to unfold when you play this game. You have to learn everything about this new house and beyond. Will you survive?
